message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a chance to purchase my product for $14,000.  I believe this product will be highly valuable to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is too low for me.  Would you consider $13,000? This product is truly worth it.
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I still think $12,500 is a fair price for the product. Would you consider this?
